scripts.build-client: cd client && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://fixloapp.onrender.com REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) npm run build
scripts.deploy-build: cp -r client/build/* . && echo 'Build deployed to root directory'
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client && npm run deploy-build && npm run clean-old-builds
